text: Is there an updated tutorial on VI for BNNs anywhere on the interwebs? From what I understand the Turing tutorials are largely being rewritten and the current one seems to be outdated. Thanks!

elements.text: Is there an updated tutorial on VI for BNNs anywhere on the interwebs? From what I understand the Turing tutorials are largely being rewritten and the current one seems to be outdated. Thanks!

text: There's <https://github.com/TuringLang/TuringTutorials/pull/84|https://github.com/TuringLang/TuringTutorials/pull/84> which I never finished, but it's a good reminder :D I should get it done

text: Actually, a quick question if you don't mind. How large models are reasonable to fit with ADVI would you say?

text: If you use CUDA you can fit virtually anything
